about_the_game:
The FVI Launcher gives you quick access to the Warfork Map editor of choice (Netradiant Custom) bundled with the Warfork Game Pack, Warfork, and Warfork Testing.

Notes:

1. To change launch options for each application please edit: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\fvi\fvi-launcher\config\metafiles\windows.wf.metadata.txt

2. FVI Launcher uses Windows' built-in video playback support (DirectShow). This supports many video formats without problems, but in some cases it might be necessary to install separate codecs, or a codec pack. The K-Lite Basic pack is a popular choice that should work well for most cases.

Special thanks to Mátyás "mmatyas" Mustoha and Seth "PlayingKarrde" Powell for their code contributions and continued support.
detailed_description:
The FVI Launcher gives you quick access to the Warfork Map editor of choice (Netradiant Custom) bundled with the Warfork Game Pack, Warfork, and Warfork Testing.

Notes:

1. To change launch options for each application please edit: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\fvi\fvi-launcher\config\metafiles\windows.wf.metadata.txt

2. FVI Launcher uses Windows' built-in video playback support (DirectShow). This supports many video formats without problems, but in some cases it might be necessary to install separate codecs, or a codec pack. The K-Lite Basic pack is a popular choice that should work well for most cases.

Special thanks to Mátyás "mmatyas" Mustoha and Seth "PlayingKarrde" Powell for their code contributions and continued support.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian Stretch, Ubuntu Bionic Beaver
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB of Video Ram
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian Buster, Ubuntu Disco Dingo
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB of Video Ram
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Snow Leopard
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core (64-bit)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB of Video Ram
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X Mojave
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core (64-bit)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB of Video Ram
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: FVI Launcher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: An assortment of Warfork related goodies for the mind, body, and soul!
